track.strDescriptionEN:
"Wrecking Ball" is a song by Miley Cyrus for her fourth studio album Bangerz (2013). It appears as the sixth track on the album. The song was made available when Bangerz was pre-ordered from iTunes, beginning on August 25, 2013. It is set to be released to American radio as the second single from Bangerz.

The video was released on September 9, 2013 on VEVO. It was directed by Terry Richardson. The video begins with a close-up of Cyrus standing in front of a completely white backdrop and crying while performing the song. The video also shows Cyrus sitting naked on top of a wrecking ball and licking a sledgehammer. 24 hours after its release, the video reached a peak of 19.3 million views with breaking VEVO record from One Direction for the second time
